skillTree.localised_description: Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.
At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.localised_description: None offer greater insult to the Blood God's colossal pride than the Dark Prince's hedonistic acolytes, making them the prized trophies of Khorne's chosen hunter.

effects.description:
Ward save: 5% when fighting against Slaanesh
	(Hero's army)

Double experience gain for units when fighting against Slaanesh
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The need for fresh red meat is not driven by hunger for sustenance, but the unholy exhilaration of consuming an enemy’s flesh.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Karanak's kills are quicksilver perfection, the better to swiftly feed his hunger and his master's need for spilt blood.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Talon of the Skull Throne"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: The unrelenting vitality of Khorne’s chosen Hound affords him even greater strength for the hunt and the final moment of violence.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

skillTree.localised_description: An eternity of grinding down bones of slaughtered prey and discarded from the Skull Throne has tempered each of Karanak’s jaws.
The most nightmarish of Karanak's heads tracks his quarry through its own thoughts, pursuing them through dreamscapes and delusions.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Karanak tracks the blood scent across space and time, until the battlefield offers no hiding place from Khorne’s chosen hunter.

attributes.bullet_text:
This unit is permanently visible to the enemy, regardless of line of sight.
	
	Revealed units are not affected by the following attributes:
	 Hide Forest
	 Stalk
	 Unspottable

skillTree.localised_description: Karanak’s three snouts sniff the air for traces of his prey, each savouring a portion of the scent and following it to the ends of the earth.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(enemy characters in region)

Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%
	(accompanying Lord)
Cooldown: -20% to "Prey of the Blood God"

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: To become Khorne’s chosen hunter takes ruthlessness, implacability, and the zeal to serve the Blood God’s vengeful whims unquestionably.
The most unyielding of Karanak's heads can follow a scent through time; back to the moment of the creation of everything, or forward to the end of the universe.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: As leagues untold fall away beneath his clawed feet, Karanak’s bestial howls echo through the void, drawing other Flesh Hounds to his presence.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Flesh Hounds

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 5% for Chaos Warhounds and Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: At the fore of his dreaded pack the Daemonic apex predator stalks his prey, his slavering kin following cautiously in his stead.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Chaos Warhounds and Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Stalk for Chaos Warhounds and Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: Across a thousand kingdoms and realms beyond, the bestial chorus of Karanak’s hunt has long since become the harbinger of dire fates.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Chaos Warhounds and Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(Hero's army)
Ability number of uses: +1 for "Karanak's Howl"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Flesh Hounds

skillTree.localised_description: The most ravenous of Karanak's heads follows his victims through physical reality, tracking them over plains, forests, mountains and environments too bizarre to describe.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

items.colour_text: Thicker and heavier than those of his pack, Karanak’s Collar of Khorne is enchanted with spite and abjuration, immunising the hound against callow sorcery.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is unable to activate abilities or cast spells.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Chasing down those who have drawn the Blood God's ire, Karanak drives his fellow Flesh Hounds to snarling madness in glory of the hunt.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Chaos Warhounds and Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +6 for Chaos Warhounds and Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(Hero's army)
